mods.abstract: A RUNAWAY IN JAIL. WAS committed into the Jail of the Parish of St. Landry, on the 29th August last, 1853, a negroman calling himself Isaac, and saying he belongs to Mr. Ogden, residing on Bayou BÅ“uf in this Parish. Isaac is of a griffe color, about 40 years old, spare made, 5 feet 10 inches high, speaking English only. The owner is requested to come forward, prove property, pay charges and take him away, otherwise he will be disposed of according to law. CHS. THOMPSON, Jailor. Opelousas, Sept. 3d, 1853.

recordInfo.recordOrigin: Transformed into MODS from extended Dublin Core by the LDL Development Team at Louisiana State University.
